AMINVMeMIPort.description: This is the schema definition for the AMINVMeMIPort.
AMINVMeMIPort.longDescription: This schemas defines the properties and actions which is used in the NVMe Ports.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

PortInformation.description: Indicates the properties related to NVMeMISubSystemInformation
PortInformation.longDescription: Indicates the properties related to NVMeMISubSystemInformation

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

CurrentAddress.description: This property shall specify the CurrentAddress of the NVMe-MI Subsystem
CurrentAddress.longDescription: This property shall specify the CurrentAddress of the NVMe-MI Subsystem

CurrentLinkSpeed.description: This property shall specify the CurrentLinkSpeed of the NVMe-MI Subsystem.
CurrentLinkSpeed.longDescription: This property shall specify the CurrentLinkSpeed of the NVMe-MI Subsystem.

EndPointAddress.description: This property shall specify the EndPointAddress of the NVMe-MI Subsystem
EndPointAddress.longDescription: This property shall specify the EndPointAddress of the NVMe-MI Subsystem

MaxEndPointFrequency.description: This property shall specify the MaxEndPointFrequency of the NVMe-MI Subsystem
MaxEndPointFrequency.longDescription: This property shall specify the MaxEndPointFrequency of the NVMe-MI Subsystem

MaxFrequency.description: This property shall specify the MaxFrequency status of the NVMe-MI Subsystem
MaxFrequency.longDescription: This property shall specify the MaxFrequency the NVMe-MI Subsystem

MaxLinkWidth.description: This property shall specify the MaxLinkWidth of the NVMe-MI Subsystem.
MaxLinkWidth.longDescription: This property shall specify the MaxLinkWidth of the NVMe-MI Subsystem.

MaxMCTPTransUnitSize.description: This property shall specify the MaxMCTPTransUnitSize of the NVMe-MI Subsystem.
MaxMCTPTransUnitSize.longDescription: This property shall specify the MaxMCTPTransUnitSize of the NVMe-MI Subsystem.

MaxPayloadSize.description: This property shall specify the MaxPayloadSize status of the NVMe-MI Subsystem.
MaxPayloadSize.longDescription: This property shall specify the MaxPayloadSize status of the NVMe-MI Subsystem.

NVMeBasicManagementCommand.description: This property shall specify the NVMeBasicManagementCommand of the NVMe-MI Subsystem
NVMeBasicManagementCommand.longDescription: This property shall specify the NVMeBasicManagementCommand of the NVMe-MI Subsystem

NegotiatedLinkWidth.description: This property shall specify the NegotiatedLinkWidth status of the NVMe-MI Subsystem
NegotiatedLinkWidth.longDescription: This property shall specify the NegotiatedLinkWidth status of the NVMe-MI Subsystem

PortNo.description: This property shall specify the AvailableSpare of the NVMe-MI Subsystem.
PortNo.longDescription: This property shall specify the AvailableSpare of the NVMe-MI Subsystem

PortStatus.description: This property shall specify the CompositeTempChange of the NVMe-MI Subsystem.
PortStatus.longDescription: This property shall specify the CompositeTempChange of the NVMe-MI Subsystem.

PortType.description: This property shall specify the ControllerEnableChangeOccured of the NVMe-MI Subsystem.
PortType.longDescription: This property shall specify the ControllerEnableChangeOccured of the NVMe-MI Subsystem.

SupportedLinkSpeeds.description: This property shall specify the SupportedLinkSpeeds status of the NVMe-MI Subsystem
SupportedLinkSpeeds.longDescription: This property shall specify the SupportedLinkSpeeds status of the NVMe-MI Subsystem

title: #AMINVMeMIPort.v1_0_0
